summary: Changes elven armor to heavy. Adds appropriate armor rating, weight, and values.
descriptionHtml:
Changes elven armor to be heavy. Adds appropriate armor rating, weight, and values. Includes all regular elven armor, gilded, light, and enchanted versions.

New Values:

Elven Gilded Armor: 43 armor rating, 35 weight, 800 value

Elven Armor: 37 armor rating, 35 weight, 400 value
Elven Boots: 14 armor rating, 8 weight, 85 value
Elven Gauntlets: 14 armor rating, 8 weight, 85 value
Elven Helmet: 20 armor rating, 5 weight, 200 value
Elven Shield: 28 armor rating, 12 weight, 225 value

Elven Light Armor: 33 armor rating, 35 weight, 275 value
Elven Light Boots: 13 armor rating, 8 weight, 55 value
Elven Light Gauntlets: 13 armor rating, 8 weight, 55 value
Elven Light Helmet: 19 armor rating, 5 weight, 150 value

This replaces the existing default armor. It does not add additional heavy armor.


[b][size=3]-INSTALLATION-[/size][/b]
Extract .esp file to the Skyrim data folder, located in the directory. Enable the .esp.
author: Rynx
